price: Saa Da no Nyankopͻn bεfrε wͻn aka akyerε wͻn sε: “Wͻn a na modwen sε wͻyε M’ahokafoͻ no wͻ hen?”
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يُنَادِيهِمۡ فَيَقُولُ أَيۡنَ شُرَكَآءِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ كُنتُمۡ تَزۡعُمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wayawma yunādīhim fayaqūlu ayna shurakāiya alladhīna kuntum tazʿumūna
